title: "Your account has been transferred to other region"
body:
Hi Guys,

I can't login on my main account after the patch of this week.
When I try I get the message "Your account has been transferred to other region".
But I didn't do anything. Don't seem like I got hacked cuz no one is playing on my account.
The weird thing is , yesterday I was trying to login (on the website) on my account and tried all the regions.
When I tried the Russian region I got in, but it wasnt my account. The username was different. My russion is under 0, but I noticed my mail address was also used for that player his account.

(Today I also can't login anymore on the Russian region)

Im trying to reach someone of riot since wednesday, but still no reaction.

Are their other players with the same problem?

Cheers

replies.body: It sounds really weird if you got to an account on another region not belonging to you, unless it was mistakenly transferred there.  Let us help you out!  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so our account team can locate the correct account and get everything fixed up for you.  We'll see you in your ticket and respond back as soon as we can!

I already made a ticket wedneday, still no reaction.
Did not say anything about that russian thing that happened. Because that happened thursday night. (got the account name of that russian account).

But im afraid if I reply on the mail Riot send me. Im going back in Q. 

Do I need to make a new one?

If you submitted a regular ticket instead of an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), you might be asked to make a new ticket.  If you have a ticket number, though, I'd be happy to check on the status for you.

is this enough?

"Thanks for contacting our Player Support Team! We received your request (#31733233) "
Thanks in advance!!

Does the support service works in the weekends? ;)
Yeah, we are here everyday!  I was able to confirm that your ticket was received, and being reviewed by our account team.  They'll get back to you as soon as they can!

Hey Porocles,

Last night I received a mail from Riot in russian.
I cant speak russian so I google translated it. If google transalte is correct they say I used : malicious third-party programs.
But I never did that. Already started scanning my pc for any virusses, didn't find anything. Changed my password of my main account.

I still hope I can get my account back.

I dont know what I can do anymore.

This is the username of the russian account that was for some reason linked to my account : Call Me Titanz

Last months I only logged in from Belgium (don't know it this info helps you out)
ISP : Telenet

Unfortunately, I don't have visibility on the account or RU support.  Your best bet would be to continue speaking with your specialist.  Based on what you're saying, though, they should be able to investigate further if it was due to unauthorized access or field you to the proper team.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=9R5GxG6A,comment-id=0000000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2017-09-16T17:05:04.699+0000)
>
> Unfortunately, I don't have visibility on the account or RU support.  Your best bet would be to continue speaking with your specialist.  Based on what you're saying, though, they should be able to investigate further if it was due to unauthorized access or field you to the proper team.

Still haven't receive any mail from riot :(.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=9R5GxG6A,comment-id=0000000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2017-09-16T17:05:04.699+0000)
>
> Unfortunately, I don't have visibility on the account or RU support.  Your best bet would be to continue speaking with your specialist.  Based on what you're saying, though, they should be able to investigate further if it was due to unauthorized access.

Ok, already started a second ticket --> (#31765611). Where I gave all the info I can think off.
Do you have any Idea how long it can take before I get any answer?
Because I started the first ticket wednesday and still haven't got any reaction. (only you replied, which im very gratefull for).
Im just afraid im gonna lose my account (that I already have since season1).

Pff so desperate tho!!

Thanks anyways!

Thanks mate!! :) 

Have a great weekend!

Cheers from Belgium
